string-array.name: create
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE [Fragen] ( [ID] intEGER UNIQUE NOT NULL, [name] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [questions] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [caw] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [incaw1] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [incaw2] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [incaw3] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [bild] booLEAN NOT NULL, [video] booLEAN NOT NULL, [audio] booLEAN NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE [Museumsdatas] ( [ID] inTEGER UNIQUE NOT NULL, [name] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [signature] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [sachbegriff] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [titel] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [geoBezug] varCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [bild] booLEAN NOT NULL, [video] booLEAN NOT NULL, [audio] booLEAN NOT NULL, [wikipedia] varCHAR(100) NOT NULL );
